tech_startup.name: Tech Startup
tech_startup.description: Modern, innovative 3D isometric style with tech aesthetics
tech_startup.visual_style: 3D isometric design, gradient overlays, sharp geometric shapes
tech_startup.lighting: bright, multiple light sources, neon accents
dos: use vibrant blue and teal gradients
include floating UI elements or holograms
add subtle grid patterns or tech textures
tech_startup.prompt_suffix: 3D isometric design, vibrant blue (#4A90E2) and teal (#50E3C2) gradient background, modern tech aesthetic, floating geometric elements, clean minimalist composition, soft neon glow, glossy metallic surfaces, sharp edges, professional lighting, high contrast

luxury_brand.name: Luxury Brand
luxury_brand.description: Elegant, sophisticated photorealistic style with premium aesthetics
luxury_brand.visual_style: photorealistic, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, shallow depth of field
luxury_brand.texture: premium materials, marble, leather, gold accents
luxury_brand.lighting: dramatic side lighting, high contrast shadows, golden hour warmth
luxury_brand.camera_style: professional product photography, shallow depth of field, bokeh
dos: include premium materials like marble or leather
luxury_brand.prompt_suffix: photorealistic professional product photography, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, elegant black (#1A1A1A) background with gold (#D4AF37) metallic accents, marble or premium leather textures, shallow depth of field with beautiful bokeh, subtle reflections, high-end luxury aesthetic, ultra-detailed, cinematic composition

eco_friendly.name: Eco-Friendly
eco_friendly.description: Natural, sustainable watercolor style with organic aesthetics
eco_friendly.visual_style: soft watercolor painting, organic flowing shapes, hand-crafted feel
eco_friendly.texture: recycled paper texture, natural fibers, soft brushstrokes
eco_friendly.lighting: soft natural daylight, gentle shadows, warm sunlight filtering through leaves
eco_friendly.camera_style: natural perspective, centered composition, airy negative space
dos: use earthy olive green (#6B8E23) and sage (#8FBC8F) tones
include natural plant elements or leaves
add subtle paper or linen textures
eco_friendly.prompt_suffix: soft watercolor illustration, natural olive green (#6B8E23) and sage (#8FBC8F) color palette, organic flowing shapes, recycled paper texture, gentle natural daylight, plant elements and leaves, eco-friendly sustainable aesthetic, hand-painted feel, soft edges, peaceful composition with negative space
